Bedroc Documentation
####################

| Author: Dan J. Bower
| Institute of Geochemistry and Petrology
| Department of Earth and Planetary Sciences
| ETH Zurich, Switzerland

*Bedroc* is available at https://github.com/ExPlanetology/bedroc. Please cite this GitHub repository and the specific *Bedroc* version number you used when using *Bedroc* in your research.
